The Story Behind Fenty Beauty Gloss Bomb

Launched in 2017 alongside the groundbreaking Fenty Beauty line, the Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer was one of Rihanna's first beauty products. Created with her vision of inclusivity, this lip gloss was designed to look amazing on people of all ages, skin tones, and genders. The "Riri" shade pays homage to the founder herself, offering that perfect blend of color and shine that the newly arrived beauty icon is known for.

The Fenty Beauty philosophy centers around creating makeup for everyone - "Beauty for All" - and this universal lip gloss embodies that mission perfectly. Since its launch, the Gloss Bomb has become a cult favorite and a luxury beauty staple in makeup bags worldwide.

Frequently Asked Question

Is Fenty Beauty Gloss Bomb sticky like other lip glosses?
No, the Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer features an innovative formula that delivers high shine without the typical stickiness of traditional glosses. The formula contains shea butter that conditions and nourishes your lips while providing explosive shine. Many users report that it feels comfortable and lightweight on the lips, making it ideal for everyday wear or special occasions.
